items.title: Mastering the Google Search Adwords Certification in a Week!
items.headline: Master the Foundations of Search Engine Marketing 2020/2021 - Google Adwords
objectives_summary: Google Search Advertising - Search Engine Marketing (SEM), Pay Per Click Advertising (PPC) - Mastering the Foundations

You will learn the key principles of Google Advertising and Master the Foundations of Google Adwords. You will learn about setting up business goals in line with a companies business objectives. The course content will include strategies to grow a business with Google ads; in-depth exploration of the value of Google Search; develop an understanding of the Google ad auction, learn to deliver the right message through text adverts; understand the concept of producing relevant ads utilising ad extensions; develop an understanding of increasing efficiency with automated bidding; how to reach valued customers with search audiences; boost performance using optimisation scores and increase conversions using performance planner
Google adwords
